name: Stickman Parkour (Prototype)
description:
Jump. Run. Win.

In this game, you will play as a stickman who will have to complete various parkour challenges in order to win. The game is a prototype, and if you like the game, you can send a positive comment or send a monetary donation. This is how we and our team will understand that the project is worth promoting.

What will happen in the game itself? There are supposed to be 50 levels, each with a new player ability or a new kind of obstacle. Also, character abilities can be bought in the in-game store for in-game currency. Game currency (RCoin) will be mined at levels or with donations.
